website_summaries.verdict: With its quality and value, Under Armour Charged Bandit 5 has received good reviews from people who have tried it for running, workout, and other tough activities. Customers are happy with this running shoe’s affordability, durability, and stylish structure. The optimal cushioning and lightweight construction were also praised by many consumers. Only a few consumers complained about the shoe’s inconsistent fit and in-shoe feel.
pros: Under Armour Charged Bandit 5 is a great shoe with a sturdy bottom
It also lasts longer than other running shoes, a reviewer claimed
This shoe is perfect for walking, running, and workout sessions, according to a lot of users
Some people also mentioned that the shoe is stylish enough to be used for casual walks and regular non-strenuous activities
A consumer expressed that this running gear provides more comfort on the heel compared to other Under Armour running shoes
It also offers great assist during start on race
The lightweight structure of the shoe helps increase the running speed, wrote a commenter
Several purchasers appreciated the value of this running companion considering the quality of the components and its features
The shoe fits very well and very comfortable to wear for long runs and other activities, said a runner
A wearer mentioned that he used this shoe for over 2 months and it’s still very comfortable and good-looking
It can keep the foot dry even when worn for extended periods, a buyer claimed
cons: The shoe feels a bit narrow, according to a tester
A purchaser, who brought another pair, said that the Under Armour Charged Bandit 5 has inconsistent foam cushioning feel

customer_reviews.title: If you are over 8 stone don't use these to run in you'll damage your knees not enough cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Slightly tight fit but have stretched after wearing a couple of times, not a lot of padding on the sole don't think I'd be running to far in these just for casual wear to the pub.
customer_reviews.author: Pete sanger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fashionable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Suffering from feet problems most of my life a friend recommended these trainers. I must admit they are extremely comfortable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S

customer_reviews.title: Well priced running trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to start running again. Having done a few months they are still comfortable and show no signs of fault. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kev G W

customer_reviews.title: New running shoes with a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The price was not very expensive and the shoes are perfectly suitable for jogging. Furthermore the look of the shoes appeals to me. The delivery time was also short from UK to Germany.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Höfling

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: The most insane pain 2k into a run. Can feel the pattern on the bottom of each shoe cutting into my feet, 1 huge blister on each foot. Cheers.... It actually feels like being cut when running
customer_reviews.author: james pearce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for extensive walking. Been out twice and impressed by the fit and spring in the sole. Love Under Armour and these are quality.
customer_reviews.author: D18ANM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These are smart lookin trainers, cumfy n fit well, worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Oh WOW!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe came perfect! Its very light and not to mention SO COMFORTABLE! Plenty of cushioning and padding around the heel. Perfect for running or going to the gym! No regrets getting this shoe!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for running and work
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear this shoes at work becuase they are very comfortable. For running they are great as well.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for running purposes. They seem ok.
customer_reviews.author: Juddee

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable in the right places, works for running, for me. Definitely worth the price whole on sale

customer_reviews.title: Swap the laces, then they are good!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, comfy, but laces constantly come undone as they are nylon, swapped for better ones and now sorted.
customer_reviews.author: Powder Skiier

customer_reviews.title: Quality 👌
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers not had this brand before I like 🥰

customer_reviews.title: Got the item on time and the right fit very happy
customer_reviews.text: The running shoes what I ordered were very comfortable and they were a very good price and I would recommend them to other userers

customer_reviews.title: Colour problems
customer_reviews.text: I think my item is flawed, the colour of the sole on both shoes has leaked into the upper portion of the blue part of the sole. This looks awful as part orange and part blue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Used for the gym.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly comfortable as a gym shoe. Haven't used them for running but they feel supportive and comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Chick

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.text: The comfort level just great. Helps me as I have a bad knee and don’t feel any pressure! Like walking on clouds! Keep it up guys!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Venkatesh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid training shoe, probably needed an extra half size.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Would say a bit tight for wide feet , overall its good
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for running and very comfortable. Exactly the size I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting and perfect for daily use and for running!

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, they are very comfortable and light. I enjoy running with them. I would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers that look awesome - well worth the money. Fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. I use them for running. Very good price.

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Looks good. Feels good while walking or running.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good ankle support. Nice padding in the heel area also. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fool by other brands
customer_reviews.text: One of best trainers i've had for a very long time fit and feels lovely light and balanced and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: maxwell creese

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Bandit 5 Sports Trainers, Jogging Shoes
product_meta.description:
Under Armour Charged Bandit five Sports Shoes - Stay lighter than air during exercise with these essential men's running shoes.

Incorporating a moulded comfort collar which locks in the heel and a dual-layer charged cushioning midsole which is firmer below the heel and softer below the forefoot, these shoes offer support and comfort. In addition, a solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight, while anatomically placed flex grooves offer proper flexibility in key areas. The shoes feature a rebound EVA sockliner for a comfortable and responsive ride, are breathable and fast-drying. The runners are made of mesh.

UNDER ARMOUR MAKES ATHLETES BETTER.

We started with a T-shirt that gave athletes an undeniable advantage and ultimately resulted in a complete renewal of sportswear. Today, innovation is our lifeblood and the key to achieving our brand mission.

The product details:

 * Men's running shoes
 * Moulded Comfort Collar and dual-layer Charged Cushioning midsole
 * EVA sockliner
 * Fast-drying fabric
 * Comfortable and breathable
 * Material: Mesh
 * Fit: Men's
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Lightweight, engineered two-toned mesh upper construction for increased ventilation
Moulded Comfort Collar locks in the heel with a soft, plush feel for zero distractions
High rebound EVA sockliner for a comfortable & responsive ride
Dual-layer Charged Cushioning midsole is firmer below the heel & softer below the forefoot for a blend of support & comfort that's built to perform
Solid rubber outsole covers high-impact zones for greater durability with less weight
Anatomically placed flex grooves offer proper flexibility in key areas
